ValidationRule.description: Periodic Frequency can only be used if Billing Type = Time & Materials and Billing Cycle = Periodic or if Billing Type = Fixed Price or Fixed Price + Expenses and Billing Cycle = Retainer
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( amc__Periodic_Billing_Frequency__c ))) , OR( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price"), ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Type__c, "Fixed Price + Expenses")) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Cycle__c, "Retainer")) ) , AND(ISPICKVAL( amc__Billing_Type__c , "Time & Materials"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(amc__Billing_Cycle__c, "Periodic")))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only specify a Periodic Billing Frequency where Billing Type = Time & Materials and Billing Cycle = Periodic or where Billing Type = Fixed Price or Fixed Price + Expenses and Billing Cycle = Retainer
